resources.string: Thinker
Permissions Activity
A task needs permission to continue
Touch this notification to proceed.
Tasks Notifications
A problem occurred while verifying a constraint
The task will not be executed.
A problem occurred while making the prompt
A problem occurred while the response was being generated.
Client side issue
An unexpected problem occurred
API key not provided or invalid
Server side issue
There is no Internet connection
Invalid exit argument, value greater than 255
Command not found
Command invoked cannot execute (possibly permission problems)
